settings.content: These settings are optional and will override the typography settings above if enabled.

settings.label: Text Alternative
settings.info: A less prominent tone of the text color

settings.label: Panels Background
settings.info: Used to divide content. See this documentation for examples.

settings.content: These settings are optional and are used to override the colors above for more specific elements.
Add to Cart Button Background Hover
You can chose betweeen a solid or transparent header in the Home section.

settings.label: Use Image For Logo?
settings.info: You will need to upload 2 images, both a standard and a retina logo are required

settings.label: Retina Logo (Required)
settings.info: Dimensions should be exactly twice as large as the standard logo

settings.content: You will also need to enable customer accounts in your store settings. [For more information checkout the documentation](http://docs.shopify.com/manual/your-store/customers/customer-accounts).
To enable set the 'Links To' field of a main menu item to 'All Products'.

settings.label: Use a Transparent Header?
settings.info: Fades in when you hover over

settings.content: Each widget is associated with a letter of the alphabet. The fullscreen slider relates to 'a', the product slider relates to 'b' etc.
You can reorder them by filling out the text box below using commas to separate each letter.
To disable a widget simply omit it's corresponding letter. e.g. Enter a,c,d,e to disable just the product slider.

settings.label: Tagline
settings.default: Welcome to the Blockshop theme! To get started, we recommending having a bit more of a read about the theme and it's features.

settings.label: Tagline
settings.default: Content is divided in large customizable blocks giving you freedom to adjust layout, colour, typography and UI elements to represent your brand with boldness and clarity.

settings.label: Title
settings.default: Let your products to the talking

settings.label: Tagline
settings.default: Clean, minimal product pages with customisable layouts, popup galleries, modal zoom and codeable description tabs for finer detail.

settings.label: Description
settings.default: The homepage widgets are 3 customisable horizontal blocks - Information Block, Promotional Block and the Social Block that can be customized as marketing tools for your store. Each can be enabled or disabled to suit your requirements.

settings.label: Text
settings.default: Read more about our Widget Blocks

settings.label: Text
settings.default: © 2013 Blockshop Shopify Theme Designed with love by Troop Digital

settings.label: MailChimp Form Action [( ? )](http://support.shopify.com/customer/portal/articles/640278)
settings.info: Leave blank to use default signup form. [Where do I get my MailChimp Form Action?](http://support.shopify.com/customer/portal/articles/640278)

settings.content: Positions - For 3 Column Layout (screens sizes 1280px and up)
At least one item in each the left column and right column is required

settings.label: Show Notification Form When Product Is Unavailable?
Enable Modal Popup?
settings.info: Triggers when you click the main image

settings.label: Enable Product Zoom?
settings.info: Triggers when you roll your mouse over the main image

settings.content: Select the "page.with-sidebar" option in the template section of your page to enable these sidebar settings below.
